        protected final String id
        User ID.

      • discriminator

        protected final String discriminator
        User discriminator. Distinguishes users with the same name. This is here in case it becomes necessary.

      • presence

        protected Presences presence
        This user's presence. One of [online/idle/offline].

      • avatarURL

        protected String avatarURL
        The user's avatar in URL form.

      • roles

        protected HashMap<String,List<IRole>> roles
        The roles the user is a part of. (Key = guild id).

        protected final IDiscordClient client
        The client that created this object.
